divs: Sighting DetailsI didn't realize that I had actually got something with my Sony 3.2 MB cyber shot Camera but when I enlarged the bright light I had seen on Saturday you can see the shape & brightness compared to the stars,just above the roof peek, if you scan around the photo you can also see other round objects,Saturday night was very clear.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Abbotsford

This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: if you look over the roof of the home, & zoom in on the bright light..
